text: National Beef is an American food company. They are a beef processor. The company is headquartered in Kansas City, Missouri, United States. They make fresh, chilled, and further processed beef and beef by-products for customers worldwide. The company’s main focuses include branded box beef, consumer ready beef, portion control beef and wet blue leather. ==Sales & Operations== National Beef is the United States’s fourth biggest beef processor. They make more than $7 billion every year. ==Controversies== Between 1991 and 1994, several accidental and unrelated employee deaths happened. The company faced legal prosecution. The cases ended with settlements. ==References== Category:Companies based in Missouri Category:American food companies Category:Beef Category:1992 establishments in the United States Category:1990s establishments in Missouri
title: National Beef
